title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor while the file is already open in another editor, nothing happens.
EB: When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor while the file is already open in another editor, a new editor should open with the file.
SR:
1. Open the ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file named test.xml.
4. The file should open in the scripted resource editor example.
5. Select the test.xml file in the Navigator.
6. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'.
7. Select 'Default Text Editor'.
8. A new editor should open with the test.xml file.
